lines.text:
[facing a pub full of rowdy drunks]
My father says would you please stop making that bloody racket! Only he didn't say please like I did.
Ian's just told me. About you and Hannah. You bastard. I just want you to know I think you're a total and utter bastard and that one of these days I hope you'll get what's coming to you.
Having said that, best of luck with the show tonight and I hope it goes really well for you.
Don't mind us, Mr. Jones, you'll get used to us. Possibly.
Women, they never like being taken by surprise, do they? Unless they know what it is in advance.
I call her my Swiss Army wife. No man should be without one.
